res.rBody:
Deduc me
in semita per semita mandatorum tuorum alleluia quoniam
ipsam volui ipsa volui ipsam voluit alleluia inclina cor meum in testimonia tua alleluia alleluia alleluia

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-G CAO-E CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

verses.vBody:
Averte oculos meos ne videant
vanitatem in via tua vivifica me
silent reading
